des:
Kohler Verdera Smart Home Skill allows you to control your Verdera Mirror Task Lights with hands-free voice control. The skill provides on/off and dimming control of the mirror task lights.

To use this skill, you must have one or more Kohler Verdera Mirrors connected to your home WiFi network.

To get started:
- Click the ENABLE button.
- Ensure your Kohler Verdera is connected. For more information, visit https://www.us.kohler.com/us/smarthome/content/smarthome.html
- Enter your Kohler Verdera username and password to link your account.

Here are just a few of the ways Kohler Verdera skill work to bring voice control to your KOHLER plumbing products:

Verdera Mirror
- Alexa, turn on Verdera name
- Alexa, turn off Verdera name
- Alexa, dim Verdera name

For a full list of features and voice prompts, visit https://support.kohler.com/hc/en-us .

Visit https://support.kohler.com/hc/en-us or call Kohler Customer Care at 800-4KOHLER (800-456-4537), M-F 8am-6pm
